original_text: He shall also make restitution for what he has done amiss in the holy thing and shall add a fifth to it and give it to the priest. And the priest shall make atonement for him with the ram of the guilt offering, and he shall be forgiven.
korean_text: 성물에 대한 잘못을 보상하되 그것에 오분의 일을 더하여 제사장에게 줄 것이요 제사장은 그 속건제의 숫양으로 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: for what he has done amiss in the holy thing
and shall add a fifth to it
and give it to the priest
And the priest shall make atonement for him
with the ram of the guilt offering
